location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Coll 29/45(3D) 'Conditions of service of personnel serving in the Persian Gulf: Major A C Stewart'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 33; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file concerns the recruitment of A C Stewart as Political Agent in Muscat, 1947, and correspondence regarding Stewart's salary requirements.The file is composed of correspondence between the Political Residency in the Persian Gulf, Commonwealth Relations Office, the Political Agent in Muscat (A C Stewart), and the Foreign Office.
